About Me

Weddings Captured

My journey into
wedding content creation

From the moment I picked up my first camera, I knew I'd found my calling. There's something magical about capturing fleeting moments – the nervous glance before walking down the aisle, the tears of joy during the first dance, the spontaneous laughter shared between loved ones.

Based in beautiful Glasgow, I've had the privilege of documenting love stories across Scotland and beyond. From windswept Highland elopements to grand city celebrations, each wedding brings its own unique magic that I'm honoured to preserve.

"I don't just capture moments – I preserve the feelings, the atmosphere, and the love that makes your day uniquely yours."

My approach

I believe the best content comes from genuine connection. Before your big day, I take time to get to know you – your story, your style, and your vision. This allows me to blend seamlessly into your celebration, capturing authentic moments without intrusion.

My editing style is warm and timeless, with a focus on natural light and genuine emotion. I want your wedding content to feel just as magical in fifty years as it does today.

When I'm not behind the camera

You'll find me exploring Scotland's incredible landscapes with my own camera, hunting for the best coffee spots in Glasgow, or planning my next adventure. I'm a firm believer that a well-lived life makes for better storytelling.
